column4: hi there - I just bought a 250 GB external HDD, which I need to use to transfer data between Linux and Windows - what file system should I use?
/ luisa: I remember there used to be issues with NTFS under Linux - not anymore?
not anymore... atleast I haven't had any. I don't need to, but I use NTFS on my USB drive.. write to it, FTP to it... never had a problem :)
